lf-REST" approach because they think doing REST is somehow difficult. I see=

 half-REST system than it is to go with traditional RPC (given that the cou=
pling and complexity easily amounts to the same).

hat people in the end are disappointed by REST because it causes them the s=
ame problems they set out to solve.
